name: Novotel La Grande Motte Golf

reviews.text: I spent 4 nights at this location. I had a first floor room with a garden view. The room was clean and comfortable. The shower was nice and provided adequate splash protection. The location was always clean and well maintained. Service in the restaurant and bar was amazingly slow but the beverages and meals were good. The bed was a bit uncomfortable for me ... a 6 inch foam mattress on a rigid support ... but it was OK. Parking was FREE ... very unusual. The rate was 99 euros including tax. Overall, this hotel represents an EXCELLENT value for money even though it is a car ride from the marina and beach.
reviews.title: An excellent value for money location

reviews.text: the hotel and room was clean and well maintained , the staff were friendly and helpful at all times, hotel is easy to get in and out of and a quick drive into downtown, plenty of places to eat nearby, and delivery available.

reviews.text: My comments are primarily related to the experience of check in and out. When we arrived nobody was at reception and we had to wait 10 minutes to be "Welcomed". description: The Novotel La Grande Motte Golf, a 3 star hotel with 81 rooms, is located in unique surroundings opposite the international golf course. A few minutes walk from the town centre and beaches, 15 min from Montpellier airport and 20 min from the TGV station, the hotel features four meeting rooms for training days and seminars. With private parking and a swimming pool, this is an ideal destination whether travelling on business or getting away for a weekend or short break with your partner or family.
